text: Operation Arapaima is an upcoming Tamil language action film written and directed by Prash for Time and Tide Frames with Rahman playing the lead role and Mollywood actor Tini Tom making his Kollywood debut by portraying the role of a transgender. ==Summary== Operation Arapaima is the story of a naval officer, played by Rahman and his ethical fight with a channel head and a drug don. ==Cast== *Rahman *Abhinaya *Tini Tom *Anoop Chandran *Aravind Akash *Balaji Sharma *Manisha Martin ==References== ==External links== * Category:Tamil-language films Category:Indian films Category:Upcoming films Category:Indian action drama films Category:Films featuring an item number
title: Operation Arapaima
